extension.name: PLG_INSTALLER_LIMITACTIVELOGINS
extension.author: Web357 (Yiannis Christodoulou)
extension.description: By default on a Joomla website, the Users can sign in using one account from unlimited devices/browsers at a time. This is not good for websites that have restricted content for subscribers. With this plugin, you can easily set a limit for the number of active logins that a user can have.
